    • Method Detail

      • setAttributes

        public void setAttributes(Attribute[] attributes)
        Sets feature attributes. This is optional since most classifiers can only work on real-valued attributes.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the feature attributes.

      • train

        public abstract Classifier<T> train(T[] x,
                  int[] y)
        Learns a classifier with given training data.
        Parameters:
        x - the training instances.
        y - the training labels.
        Returns:
        a trained classifier.
